title: 04/27/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/27/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys continue discuss possibilities that could play out in Thursday's NFL Draft . Pro Football Focus draft expert Mike Renner joined in the first hour to talk about the Packers’ strategy, Kyle Pitts, and more. San Francisco 49ers reporter Eric Branch talks about the question he asked Kyle Shanahan that made headlines. And Cubs radio analyst Rick Sutcliffe joined the show to talk the Dodgers/Padres rivalry, how to keep Shoehi Ohtani elite, and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
